return.description: true if success, false if failed.

params.name: acceptConfig
params.description:
the attributes of like button:
  • href: the URL to like. defaults to the current page.
  • layout: there are three options: 'standard', 'button_count', 'box_count'.
  • show_faces: specifies whether to display profile photos below the button (standard layout only).
  • width: the width of the Like button.
  • action: the verb to display on the button. Options: 'like', 'recommend'.
  • font: the font to display in the button. Options: 'arial', 'lucida grande', 'segoe ui', 'tahoma', 'trebuchet ms', 'verdana'.
  • colorscheme: the color scheme for the like button. Options: 'light', 'dark'.
